Strings.String: Installation of Microsoft Access database engine 2016 requires Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0. Contact your application vendor.
Installation of Microsoft Access database engine 2016 is not supported on Windows 7. Contact your application vendor.
Installation of Microsoft Access database engine 2016 is not supported on Windows 2008 R2. Contact your application vendor.
A fatal error occurred during the installation of Microsoft Access database engine 2016.
You do not have the permissions required to install this application. Please contact your administrator.
